name: HIVtreatmentoutcome
title: HIV treatment outcome
description: The outcome for the client which is used for reporting retention. Included in total attrition from ART: death, stopped treatment and lost to follow-up. On ART is included so that the HIV treatment outcome remains in sync.

mapping.name: Digital Adaptation Kit for Antenatal Care

element.definition: The outcome for the client which is used for reporting retention. Included in total attrition from ART: death, stopped treatment and lost to follow-up. On ART is included so that the HIV treatment outcome remains in sync.
element.comment: A process or automated method should be in place to update "On ART" to False when HIV treatment outcomes change
